original_title: Goat among Poya Day attendees in Kurunegala
original_body_lines: A special attendee was seen among the Poya Day attendees at a temple in Kurunegala.
A pet goat at the Ethkanda Raja Maha Vihara affectionately known as "Sukiri" was seen joining the Poya Day sermon at the temple, along with the devotees.
